translations: （鸡）咯咯地叫；（表示遗憾或不赞成）发出啧啧声；大惊小怪地谈论；唠叨（表示关心）
（鸡的）咯咯声；（表示不赞同或同情的）啧啧声；<美>傻瓜，笨蛋

sentences.sentence: Hens sing on the bus. Cluck! Clluck! Cluck!
sentences.translation: 母鸡在公共汽车上唱歌。咯！咯！咯！

sentences.sentence: Madame Cluck lies down on the bed motionless, I wondered if she was still alive.
sentences.translation: 克拉克夫人躺在床上一动不动，我纳闷她是否还活着。

sentences.sentence: This means sidelining corporate cluck-cluckers such as lawyers who worry that any admission of guilt will lead to lawsuits.
sentences.translation: 这意味着公司里的杞人忧天者，例如律师这样担心承认任何过失都可能导致法律诉讼，要靠边了。
